title: Arsenal vs Bournemouth LIVE score: Team news, TV channel and live stream
text:
Arsenal can climb to third in the Premier League with victory over Bournemouth at the Emirates.

The Gunners are unbeaten in their last four league matches but have managed just one win in that time, against Aston Villa in their last home match.

They secured a point against Manchester United on Monday night but Emery will be confident of an improved performance here.

Bournemouth have had a decent start to the campaign themselves and could end the weekend in the top four with an away success.

Follow all the action from the Premier League clash at the Emirates.

Arsenal: Leno, Chambers, Sokratis, Luiz, Kolasinac, Xhaka, Guendouzi, Ceballos, Pepe, Aubameyang, Saka.

Bournemouth: Ramsdale, Stacey, Cook, Ake, Rico, H Wilson, Lerma, Billing, King, Solanke, C Wilson

The match kicks off at 2pm (UK) and is not being streamed live in the UK.
description: Follow all the action from the Premier League clash at the Emirates. Kick-off at 2pm (UK).
